sourcesContent: import React,{useState} from 'react' import "./Seller.css" function Seller(){ const [field, setFeild] = useState({ title:"", email:"", address:"", image:[], description:"", price:"" }); function validateForm() { return field.title.length>0 && field.email.length>0 && field.price.length>0 && field.description.length>0 } const handleInputChange= event=>{ setFeild({search:event.target.value}) } function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); } return(
